targets.query: SELECT "transport_admin_state" FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Router_A$/ AND "name" = 'Optics$Router_A_Port' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "led_state" FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Router_A$/ AND "name" = 'Optics$Router_A_Port' ) AND $timeFilter

SELECT "controller_state" FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Router_A$/ AND "name" = 'Optics$Router_A_Port' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "laser_state" FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Router_A$/ AND "name" = 'Optics$Router_A_Port' ) AND $timeFilter

SELECT "derived_optics_type" FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Router_A$/ AND "name" = 'Optics$Router_A_Port') AND $timeFilter

SELECT "modulation_type" FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Router_A$/ AND "name" = 'Optics$Router_A_Port') AND $timeFilter

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dwdm_carrier_frequency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "Optics"+"${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dwdm_carrier_wavelength")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "Optics"+"${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-otu-oper:otu/controllers/controller/info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "otu_fec_satistics/pre_fec_ber")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["controller_name"] == "CoherentDSP"+"${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value)}))

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-otu-oper:otu/controllers/controller/info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "otu_fec_satistics/post_fec_ber")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["controller_name"] == "CoherentDSP"+"${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value)}))

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-lanes/optics-lane")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "receive_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "Optics"+"${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 100}))

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-lanes/optics-lane")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "transmit_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "Optics"+"${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 100}))

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${otu_pm_path}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "q/average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "CoherentDSP"+"${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) }))

import "strings"
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-otu-oper:otu/controllers/controller/info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "qmargin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["controller_name"] == "CoherentDSP"+"${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: strings.trim(v: r._value, cutset: "dB")}))

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${otu_pm_path}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "qmargin/average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "CoherentDSP"+"${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) }))

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${otu_pm_path}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ec_bits/data" or r["_field"] == "uc_words/data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "CoherentDSP"+"${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "optical_signal_to_noise_ratio" or r["_field"] == "snr" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "Optics"+"${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")
  |> map(fn:(r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) }))

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lane_data/laser_temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "Optics"+"${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 100}))

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-otu-oper:otu/controllers/controller/info" WITH KEY="controller_name"  WHERE source =~ /$Router_A/
list.label: Router A Port
list.name: Router_A_Port
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-otu-oper:otu/controllers/controller/info" WITH KEY="controller_name"  WHERE source =~ /$Router_A/

list.definition:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openconfig-lldp:lldp/interfaces/interface/neighbors/neighbor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${router_a_interface_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state/system_name")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")
list.label: Router_B
list.name: Router_B
list.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openconfig-lldp:lldp/interfaces/interface/neighbors/neighbor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${router_a_interface_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state/system_name")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openconfig-lldp:lldp/interfaces/interface/neighbors/neighbor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${router_a_interface_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state/port_id")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")
list.name: Router_B_Port
list.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openconfig-lldp:lldp/interfaces/interface/neighbors/neighbor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${router_a_interface_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state/port_id")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Router_A}")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "topology-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Source"] == "${Router_A}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Source_Port"] == "${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Dest_Port")
list.label: Router_B_Port_BAK
list.name: Router_B_Port_BAK
list.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "topology-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Source"] == "${Router_A}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Source_Port"] == "${Router_A_Port}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Dest_Port")

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "openconfig-lldp:lldp/interfaces/interface/neighbors/neighbor" WITH KEY="name"  WHERE source =~ /$Router_A/
list.label: Router A Interface ID
list.name: router_a_interface_id
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "openconfig-lldp:lldp/interfaces/interface/neighbors/neighbor" WITH KEY="name"  WHERE source =~ /$Router_A/

list.definition:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "${router_a_interface_id}")

list.name: router_b_interface_id
